ruleset.name: Code Style
ruleset.description: Rules which enforce a specific coding style.

rule.name: Check-List-General-1
rule.message: [General-1] Ten method phai viet thuong , tu chu thu 2 tro di phai viet hoa chu dau tien
rule.description:
Configurable naming conventions for method declarations. This rule reports method declarations which do not match the regex that applies to their specific kind (e.g. static method, or test method). Each regex can be configured through properties.
By default this rule uses the standard Apex naming convention (Camel case).

rule.name: Check-List-General-2
rule.message: [General-2] Trong xu ly, nhung method hoac funtion public phai co try catch de xu ly loi.

rule.name: Check-List-General-4
rule.message: [General-4] Viet hoa ten class (Ky tu dau tien cua ten class phai viet HOA)

rule.name: Check-List-General-5
rule.message: [General-5] Truong hop la class su dung trong batch thi dat ten theo kieu: danh tu + Batch

rule.name: Check-List-General-6
rule.message: [General-6] Truong hop la class su dung trong trigger thi dat ten theo kieu : ten Object (xoa chu __c) + Trigger

rule.name: Check-List-General-9
rule.message: [General-9] Dat ten cac bien sao cho de dung, de nho. Su dung cac tu nhu is, has….de dat ten bien

rule.name: Check-List-General-10
rule.message: [General-10] Nhung bien khai bao khong dung thi delete giup

rule.name: Check-List-Geneneral-11
rule.message: [General-11] Thuc hien khai bao bang Constant nhung bien su dung nhieu lan. Vi du: public final Integer COLUMN_DATE = 0;

rule.name: Check-List-General-12
rule.message: [General-12] Khi su dung check size of list thi phai su dung ham isEmpty() if (membershipHistoryList.size() > 0) -> if (!membershipHistoryList.isEmpty())

rule.name: Check-List-General-13
rule.message: [General-13] Ten bien bang chu thuong, tu chu thu 2 tro di phai viet hoa chu dau tien

rule.name: Check-List-General-18
rule.message: [General-18] Ngat tung parameter bang dau phay, sau do phai la 1 space 1byte

rule.name: Check-List-General-19
rule.message: [General-19] Khong khai bao bien toan cuc ko can thiet, uu tien khai bao trong method

rule.name: Check-List-General-20
rule.message: [General-20] Trong salseforce co gioi han, nen giam thieu toi da su dung loop.

rule.name: Check-List-General-22
rule.message: [General-22] Truong hop For Index - Chi su dung ten bien 1 ky tu trong vong lap for Truong hop For Object - Phai dat ten bien co y nghaa

rule.name: Check-List-General-24
rule.message: [General-24] Trong xu ly loop, khong su dung xu ly @future

rule.name: IfElseStmtsMustUseBraces
rule.message: [General-25] Cau dieu kien if phai co dau () va dau '{}'
rule.description: Avoid using if..else statements without using surrounding braces. If the code formatting or indentation is lost then it becomes difficult to separate the code being controlled from the rest.

rule.name: AvoidDeeplyNestedIfStmts
rule.message: [General-26] Trong cau dieu kien if khong duoc long vao nhau , khong nen long phuc tap

rule.name: Check-List-General-33
rule.message: [General-33] Nhung source comment ko can thiet thi phai delete sau khi hoan thanh coding, ke ca cac dong system.debug

rule.name: AvoidDmlStatementsInLoops
rule.message: [General-39] Trong xu ly loop, khong su dung xu ly DML

rule.name: Check-List-General-41
rule.message: [General-41] Khi insert, delete, update phai check isEmpty

rule.name: Check-List-General-43
rule.message: [General-43] Tranh su dung nhieu SOQL khong can thiet, giam thieu phat sinh SOQL cang nhieu cang tot. Toi da 10 SOQL

rule.name: AvoidSoqlInLoops
rule.message: [General-46] Trong xu ly loop khong duoc su dung SOQL, SOSL

rule.name: Check-List-General-53
rule.message: [General-53] Trong source controller, test class, page KO HARDCODE page apex/confirm ma thay the bang cach Page.Confim

rule.name: Batch03
rule.message: [Batch-03] Uu tien lay cac doi tuong cutom trong method start

rule.name: Batch04
rule.message: [Batch-04] Trong truog hop xu ly du lieu lon bat buoc phai get du lieu trong Database.getQueryLocator de lay

rule.name: Check-List-Batch-05
rule.message: [Batch-05] Nhung doi tuong chi xu ly update, insert 1 lan chu y de trong finish. (trong truong hop xu ly so luong nhieu record qua gioi han cua salesforce vi neu de trong execute thi co kha nag method se dc xu ly lap lai nhieu lan, vi 1 lan salesforce chi cho xu ly toi da 200 records)h.

rule.name: Check-List-Batch-08
rule.message: [Batch-08] Trong batch ko the dang ki dc nhieu schedule chu y

rule.name: Check-List-Batch-10
rule.message: [Batch-10] Trong test class phai dat method Test.StartTest, Test.StopTest khi goi batch

rule.name: Check-List-VisualPage-07
rule.message: [VisualPage-07] Trong su ly thuc hien insert, upate DB thi phai su dung savepoint de tao transaction. Truong hop tai lieu ko mo ta thi confirm lai giup.

rule.name: Check-List-VisualPage-06
rule.message: [VisualPage-06] Khi thuc hien xu ly loi thi uu tien su dung FATAL, neu tai lieu ko ghi thi xac nhan lai giup

rule.name: Check-List-VisualPage-18
rule.message: [VisualPage-18] Nhung method nao return la Pagereference thi phai co try cacth

rule.name: Check-List-Trigger-02
rule.message: [Trigger-02] Khi xu ly trigger thi phai tao cac lop handler de xe ly, trong file trigger chi xu ly su kien va delegate cho cac lop handler thuc hien

rule.name: Check-List-TestClass-01
rule.message: [TestClass-01] Trong file test ko duoc su dung @isTest(see = allData)

rule.name: Check-List-TestClass-02
rule.message: [TestClass-02] Phai su dung method Test.startTest(), Test.testStop de giam governor limits khi thuc thi test

rule.name: Check-List-TestClass-06
rule.message: [TestClass-06] Ten testClass phai la dang ten controler + Test. Truong hop trong tai lieu co ghi khac thi confirm lai voi nguoi viet tai lieu

rule.name: Check-List-TestClass-07
rule.message: [TestClass-07] Ten method test phai bat dau va chu test + Method muon test.

rule.name: Check-List-TestClass-08
rule.message: [TestClass-08] Khong duoc hardcode ID trong testclass

rule.name: Check-List-TestClass-08.2
rule.message: [TestClass-08] Khong duoc hardcode ID trong testclass
